BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.oracle.OracleDatabaseType defines List based fields but uses them like Sets
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareStatement(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/PreparedStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
